extension.name: PLG_CONTENT_ITPFLOATINGSHARE
extension.author: Todor Iliev
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2013 Todor Iliev ( ITPrism.com ). All rights reserved.
extension.description:
ITPFloatingShare is a plugin that adds floating or normal republish buttons on your site. The buttons are official widgets from top social media site - Twitter, Facebook, Google Plus One, Google Share, Tumblr, Reddit, LinkedIn, Stumbleupon, Pinterest, BufferApp,...It will help you to find more readers for your posts.

Read documentation that will help you to setup the extensions.

Invest in the extension improvement. You can sponsor the extension via SMS, PayPal or Bitcoin.

Subscribe for the newsletter to receive information about updates and new ITPrism extensions.

Please, vote for the extension on Joomla! Extensions Directory
